languages.text: "Я обрадовалась, подумала, вместо одного друга у меня теперь будет сотня! Они так жалобно пищали, так что я выпустила бедняжек на волю. Даже скормила им свой завтрак и обед... Но глупые птицы щебетали не переставая — даже после отбоя! Метались по комнате, били крыльями по лицу... и испражнялись! Я разозлилась, а они вдруг начали выклевывать друг другу глаза и нападать на меня! Тогда я испугалась — и птахи упали замертво... Не хочу больше питомцев".

traits.locale_text: "Я обрадовалась, подумала, вместо одного друга у меня теперь будет сотня! Они так жалобно пищали, так что я выпустила бедняжек на волю. Даже скормила им свой завтрак и обед... Но глупые птицы щебетали не переставая — даже после отбоя! Метались по комнате, били крыльями по лицу... и испражнялись! Я разозлилась, а они вдруг начали выклевывать друг другу глаза и нападать на меня! Тогда я испугалась — и птахи упали замертво... Не хочу больше питомцев".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "I was so excited, I thought I would have a hundred friends instead of just one! They were squeaking so piteously I let the poor things out. I even fed them my breakfast and dinner... But the stupid birds would not stop chittering even after bedtime! They were dashing about the room, smacking me in the face with their wings... and defecating! I became angry, and suddenly they started pecking at each other's eyes and attacking me! Then I became afraid — and they fell over dead... I do not think I want to keep pets anymore."
languages.original_text: "Я обрадовалась, подумала, вместо одного друга у меня теперь будет сотня! Они так жалобно пищали, так что я выпустила бедняжек на волю. Даже скормила им свой завтрак и обед... Но глупые птицы щебетали не переставая — даже после отбоя! Метались по комнате, били крыльями по лицу... и испражнялись! Я разозлилась, а они вдруг начали выклевывать друг другу глаза и нападать на меня! Тогда я испугалась — и птахи упали замертво... Не хочу больше питомцев".

languages.text: “我当时太激动了。我以为我要交的不仅仅是一位朋友，而是一百位朋友！它们一直在吱吱喳喳地叫，我就把那些可怜的鸟儿放了出来，甚至把我的早餐和晚餐都喂给了它们……可是那些愚蠢的鸟儿，就算到了睡觉的时间也叫个不停！它们在房间里乱飞乱窜，用翅膀拍打我的脸……还到处排便！于是我生气了。突然之间，它们开始互相啄对方的眼睛，还开始攻击我！然后我被吓坏了，然后它们就落在了地上，死了……我想，我恐怕再也不想养宠物了。”
languages.original_text: "I was so excited, I thought I would have a hundred friends instead of just one! They were squeaking so piteously I let the poor things out. I even fed them my breakfast and dinner... But the stupid birds would not stop chittering even after bedtime! They were dashing about the room, smacking me in the face with their wings... and defecating! I became angry, and suddenly they started pecking at each other's eyes and attacking me! Then I became afraid — and they fell over dead... I do not think I want to keep pets anymore."

traits.locale_text: “我当时太激动了。我以为我要交的不仅仅是一位朋友，而是一百位朋友！它们一直在吱吱喳喳地叫，我就把那些可怜的鸟儿放了出来，甚至把我的早餐和晚餐都喂给了它们……可是那些愚蠢的鸟儿，就算到了睡觉的时间也叫个不停！它们在房间里乱飞乱窜，用翅膀拍打我的脸……还到处排便！于是我生气了。突然之间，它们开始互相啄对方的眼睛，还开始攻击我！然后我被吓坏了，然后它们就落在了地上，死了……我想，我恐怕再也不想养宠物了。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Estaba muy emocionada. En vez de tener un nuevo amigo, ¡iba a tener cien! Piaban de forma tan lastimera que les dejé salir. Hasta les alimenté con mi desayuno y mi cena... ¡Pero los dichosos pájaros no se callaban ni por la noche! No paraban de volar de un lado para otro, de darme con sus alas... ¡ni de defecar! Me enfadé, ¡y de pronto se empezaron a picar entre ellos y me atacaron! Sentí miedo y cayeron muertos... creo que será mejor abstenerme de tener mascotas».
languages.original_text: "I was so excited, I thought I would have a hundred friends instead of just one! They were squeaking so piteously I let the poor things out. I even fed them my breakfast and dinner... But the stupid birds would not stop chittering even after bedtime! They were dashing about the room, smacking me in the face with their wings... and defecating! I became angry, and suddenly they started pecking at each other's eyes and attacking me! Then I became afraid — and they fell over dead... I do not think I want to keep pets anymore."

traits.locale_text: «Estaba muy emocionada. En vez de tener un nuevo amigo, ¡iba a tener cien! Piaban de forma tan lastimera que les dejé salir. Hasta les alimenté con mi desayuno y mi cena... ¡Pero los dichosos pájaros no se callaban ni por la noche! No paraban de volar de un lado para otro, de darme con sus alas... ¡ni de defecar! Me enfadé, ¡y de pronto se empezaron a picar entre ellos y me atacaron! Sentí miedo y cayeron muertos... creo que será mejor abstenerme de tener mascotas».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「あたくしはとてもワクワクしていました。1人ではなく100人の友達ができると！彼らがあまりにかわいそうに鳴くので、外に出してやったのです。朝食と夕食まで食べさせてやったのに…でも、バカな鳥たちは寝る時間になっても鳴きやみませんでした！部屋中を飛び回り、羽であたくしの顔を叩き…そして糞をした！あたくしが怒ると、鳥たちは突然、互いの目をつつき合い、あたくしに襲い掛かってきたのです！そしてあたくしは怖くなり…彼らは死んでしまった…もうペットは飼いたくありません」
languages.original_text: "I was so excited, I thought I would have a hundred friends instead of just one! They were squeaking so piteously I let the poor things out. I even fed them my breakfast and dinner... But the stupid birds would not stop chittering even after bedtime! They were dashing about the room, smacking me in the face with their wings... and defecating! I became angry, and suddenly they started pecking at each other's eyes and attacking me! Then I became afraid — and they fell over dead... I do not think I want to keep pets anymore."

traits.locale_text: 「あたくしはとてもワクワクしていました。1人ではなく100人の友達ができると！彼らがあまりにかわいそうに鳴くので、外に出してやったのです。朝食と夕食まで食べさせてやったのに…でも、バカな鳥たちは寝る時間になっても鳴きやみませんでした！部屋中を飛び回り、羽であたくしの顔を叩き…そして糞をした！あたくしが怒ると、鳥たちは突然、互いの目をつつき合い、あたくしに襲い掛かってきたのです！そしてあたくしは怖くなり…彼らは死んでしまった…もうペットは飼いたくありません」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich war sehr aufgeregt und dachte, ich hätte nun hundert Freunde und nicht nur einen! Sie piepten so erbarmungswürdig, dass ich die arme Kreaturen herausließ. Ich hab ihnen sogar mein Frühstück und mein Abendessen ... Aber die dummen Vögel haben auch dann weitergezwitschert, wenn schon Schlafenszeit war! Sie flatterten durchs Zimmer, streiften mit ihren Flügeln mein Gesicht ... und entleerten sich! Ich wurde wütend, und plötzlich pickten sie einander die Augen aus und griffen mich an! Dann bekam ich Angst – und sie fielen tot um ... Ich denke, ich möchte keine Haustiere mehr haben."
languages.original_text: "I was so excited, I thought I would have a hundred friends instead of just one! They were squeaking so piteously I let the poor things out. I even fed them my breakfast and dinner... But the stupid birds would not stop chittering even after bedtime! They were dashing about the room, smacking me in the face with their wings... and defecating! I became angry, and suddenly they started pecking at each other's eyes and attacking me! Then I became afraid — and they fell over dead... I do not think I want to keep pets anymore."

traits.locale_text: "Ich war sehr aufgeregt und dachte, ich hätte nun hundert Freunde und nicht nur einen! Sie piepten so erbarmungswürdig, dass ich die arme Kreaturen herausließ. Ich hab ihnen sogar mein Frühstück und mein Abendessen ... Aber die dummen Vögel haben auch dann weitergezwitschert, wenn schon Schlafenszeit war! Sie flatterten durchs Zimmer, streiften mit ihren Flügeln mein Gesicht ... und entleerten sich! Ich wurde wütend, und plötzlich pickten sie einander die Augen aus und griffen mich an! Dann bekam ich Angst – und sie fielen tot um ... Ich denke, ich möchte keine Haustiere mehr haben."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Sur le coup, j'ai été vraiment ravie d'avoir des centaines d'amis au lieu d'un seul ! Les pauvres créatures piaillaient avec tellement d'insistance que j'ai fini par les laisser sortir. Je les ai même laissées picorer mes repas... Mais une fois la nuit venue, ces maudits volatiles refusaient de se taire ! Ces horribles créatures continuaient à voleter en tout sens et à me fouetter le visage de leurs ailes... sans parler de cette manie qu'elles avaient de déféquer partout ! J'ai commencé à perdre patience, et elles se sont mises à s'attaquer entre elles. Il y en a même qui s'en sont prises à moi ! Alors, j'ai eu peur... et elles sont toutes mortes d'un coup. Je crois que je n'aurais plus jamais d'animal de compagnie. »
languages.original_text: "I was so excited, I thought I would have a hundred friends instead of just one! They were squeaking so piteously I let the poor things out. I even fed them my breakfast and dinner... But the stupid birds would not stop chittering even after bedtime! They were dashing about the room, smacking me in the face with their wings... and defecating! I became angry, and suddenly they started pecking at each other's eyes and attacking me! Then I became afraid — and they fell over dead... I do not think I want to keep pets anymore."

traits.locale_text: « Sur le coup, j'ai été vraiment ravie d'avoir des centaines d'amis au lieu d'un seul ! Les pauvres créatures piaillaient avec tellement d'insistance que j'ai fini par les laisser sortir. Je les ai même laissées picorer mes repas... Mais une fois la nuit venue, ces maudits volatiles refusaient de se taire ! Ces horribles créatures continuaient à voleter en tout sens et à me fouetter le visage de leurs ailes... sans parler de cette manie qu'elles avaient de déféquer partout ! J'ai commencé à perdre patience, et elles se sont mises à s'attaquer entre elles. Il y en a même qui s'en sont prises à moi ! Alors, j'ai eu peur... et elles sont toutes mortes d'un coup. Je crois que je n'aurais plus jamais d'animal de compagnie. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Çok heyecanlandım. Bir yerine yüz tane arkadaşım olacak diye düşündüm. Öyle yürek parçalayıcı şekilde ötüşüyorlardı ki zavallıları kafeslerinden çıkardım. Hatta onlara kahvaltımdan ve akşam yemeğimden verdim ama aptal kuşlar, yatma saati gelmesine rağmen ötmeyi kesmiyordu! Odada oradan oraya uçuşuyor, kanatlarını yüzüme çarpıyorlardı. Ayrıca her yere pisliyorlardı! Sonunda öfkelendim. Birdenbire birbirlerinin gözlerini oymaya ve bana saldırmaya başladılar! Sonra da korktum. Hepsi düşüp öldü. Artık hayvan beslemek istediğimi sanmıyorum."
languages.original_text: "I was so excited, I thought I would have a hundred friends instead of just one! They were squeaking so piteously I let the poor things out. I even fed them my breakfast and dinner... But the stupid birds would not stop chittering even after bedtime! They were dashing about the room, smacking me in the face with their wings... and defecating! I became angry, and suddenly they started pecking at each other's eyes and attacking me! Then I became afraid — and they fell over dead... I do not think I want to keep pets anymore."

traits.locale_text: "Çok heyecanlandım. Bir yerine yüz tane arkadaşım olacak diye düşündüm. Öyle yürek parçalayıcı şekilde ötüşüyorlardı ki zavallıları kafeslerinden çıkardım. Hatta onlara kahvaltımdan ve akşam yemeğimden verdim ama aptal kuşlar yatma saati gelince bile ötmeyi kesmiyordu! Odada oradan oraya uçuşuyor, kanatlarıyla yüzüme vuruyorlardı. Ayrıca her yere pisliyorlardı! Sonunda öfkelendim ve birdenbire birbirlerinin gözlerini oymaya ve bana saldırmaya başladılar! Sonra da korktum ve hepsi de düşüp öldü. Artık hayvan beslemek istemiyorum sanırım."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
